comment: /** * Returns the resolution (or effective resolution) of the experiment. This is * related to _refine.ls_d_res_high (DIFFRACTION) or * _em_3d_reconstruction.resolution (ELECTRON MICROSCOPY) for mmCif * format, or to REMARK 2 or REMARK 3 for PDB legacy * format. If more than one value is available (in rare cases), the last one is * reported. If no value is available, it defaults to * {@link #DEFAULT_RESOLUTION} ({@value #DEFAULT_RESOLUTION}). * * @return The reported experiment resolution, {@link #DEFAULT_RESOLUTION} * ({@value #DEFAULT_RESOLUTION}) if no value is available. */
